thread.title: Ambassador Bridge owner claims Michigan is stealing his toll revenue
thread.title_full: Ambassador Bridge owner claims Michigan is stealing his toll revenue

author: Gus Burns | fburns@mlive.com
title: Ambassador Bridge owner claims Michigan is stealing his toll revenue
text: Matty Moroun.jpg FILE - In a Jan. 12, 2012 file photo, Detroit International Bridge Company owner Manuel "Matty" Moroun, center, sits in court in Detroit. Wayne County Circuit Judge Prentis Edwards sent Moroun to jail for failing to comply with a court order to finish construction on the Gateway project, which is meant to connect the Ambassador Bridge to area freeways. The judge was within his rights to send Moroun to jail but should have made it clear what steps the businessman could take to win his freedom, an appeals court ruled Monday, Feb. 6, 2012. (AP Photo/Carlos Osorio, File) Gus Burns | fburns@mlive.com Matty Moroun and his Detroit International Bridge Company claim the state is improperly diverting trucks hauling hazardous cargo from crossing the Ambassador Bridge and cheating the company out of millions in tolls.
